DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect internet-based preparation outcome expectancy treatment credibility rehabilitants concern inpatient psychosomatic rehabilitation . Both study group receive usual write information preparation ( TAU ) . The patient experimental group access various video study website inpatient rehabilitation begin , patient placebo group receive special treatment . The investigator hypothesize experimental group gain positive outcome expectancy treatment credibility compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Video-based Internet Intervention Preparation Inpatient Psychosomatic Rehabilitation
DOC.criteria: Authorized inpatient rehabilitation one cooperation clinic Internet access
